newsitem.title: USA: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade slow at $62 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Texas/w Okla fed cattle trade slow at $62 - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow in the Panhandle area on Thursday, USDA said. Slaughter steers and heifers were steady to $1.00 per cwt higher in limited test.
Confirmed - 1,400 Last week - None Year Ago - 71,200
WK to date - 112,500 Last week - 78,700 Year Ago - 95,700 Steers - Select and Choice 2-3 1150-1250 lbs 62.00.

Feedlots reported light inquiry from buyers. Sales reported on 500 slaughter steers and 900 heifers; 112,500 head confirmed for week to date which includes 27,800 formulated and 100 previously contracted cattle to be shipped this week.
Note - all cattle prices based on net weights FOB the feedlot after a 4 percent shrink.
